snippet: Cisco Systems reported higher-than-expected quarterly revenue and profit, highlighting a strong recovery in demand for its switching equipment and routers.
abstract: Cisco Systems reports quarterly profit of $2.32 billion, or 45 cents a share, up from $2.25 billion, or 43 cents a share, in year-ago quarter; revenue rose almost 4 percent to $12.84 billion.
lead_paragraph: Cisco Systems reported higher-than-expected quarterly revenue and profit, highlighting a strong recovery in demand for its switching equipment and routers.

headline.main: Strong Equipment Demand Lifts Sales and Profit for Cisco
headline.print_headline: Strong Equipment Demand Lifts Sales and Profit for Cisco
